name: Chana Masala
instructions: Prepare chickpeas, soak overnight, then boil for 1 hour
Chop onions and then blend with garlic into a paste.
Saute with cumin seeds in oil over low-medium heat for a few minutes. Watch for burning.
Add spices, tomato paste, and chickpeas and cook for 3-4 minutes. Stir often to prevent burning.
Add coconut, from ~1/2 can to 1 full can, as needed to get the consistency you want. Add in batches and mix well.
Add spinach and cook until wilted.

additional_context.story: Tori and Jory lived together in university and Jory taught Tori how to cook on a budget. This was one of our go-to meals that was quick, easy, and delicious!
additional_context.tips: Let the onions cook for longer than you think to make sure the strong onion flavour is cooked away.
